subtitle: the pole is now drifting at almost 40
miles per year and the Earth's magnetic
field is weakening quickly these are
signs that a shift could be coming the
geologic record shows no major die-offs
during pole shifts and our species has
lived through a few shifts the past
three million years and we're still here
a lot of our technology is going to go
Haywire but code can be Rewritten and
software can be patched as we approach a
pole shift the Earth's magnetic field
gets Tangled Up and extremely weakened
this leaves us vulnerable to solar
activity without our magnetic field to
protect us satellites will get fried if
they're not hardened rates of cancer
will increase dramatically either way
the climate will be very unpredictable
but the biggest danger is our power
grids high enough solar activity could
knock out all electricity on Earth for
days or weeks maybe months in some
places when Dr Chan Thomas released his
book The Adam and Eve story it was
dismissed as pseudoscience and if just a
fraction of Dr Thomas's predictions come
true
our time is running out
